EmailTemplate.description: DuPont™ Nomex® 1200 denier type N101 change
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Nomex® 1200 denier type N101 change
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Nomex® 1200 denier type N101
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} :
DuPont has recently made some changes to the 1200 denier type N101 Camo green. Please read the attached letter about these exciting changes.
Let me know if you have any questions and have a great weekend.
Beth L Taylor _______________________________________________
DuPont™ Protection Technologies Account Manager DuPont™ Nomex®/ DuPont™ Kevlar® 5401 Jefferson Davis Highway, Spot 395 • Richmond VA 23234 Phone: (877) 713 -1299 or 804-383-2194 beth.l.taylor@dupont.com
